cs.SI, cs.SOC, cs.DS, cs.DM, cs.CC. 

The paper deals with the problem of information diffusion in social networks, which is a topic of interest in the fields of social networks and viral marketing. The paper also discusses algorithms and complexity related to this problem, indicating that it may belong to the categories of social networks (cs.SOC), data structures and algorithms (cs.DS), data mining (cs.DM), and computational complexity (cs.CC). However, since the paper specifically focuses on the spreading of influence in social networks, it is most likely to belong to the sub-category of social influence (cs.SI).
